title: Print-on-Demand VA (Canva + Etsy) – Long-Term Role
job_overview:
I run a growing apparel business selling on Etsy and other platforms. I’m looking for a long-term, reliable, and detail-oriented VA to manage daily tasks. This is not a short-term gig—if you’re loyal, capable, and communicative, you’ll have a secure job for years.

You’ll be responsible for:
 • Uploading designs to Printify and Etsy
 • Using Canva to create simple t-shirt designs (fonts only – no complex graphics)
 • Responding to customers using pre-written replies
 • Tracking status in a Google Sheet
 • Submitting a weekly summary

Requirements:
 • Excellent written English
 • Canva experience (or very fast learner)
 • Comfortable with Etsy or similar platforms
 • Organized, reliable, and honest
 • Stable internet and basic tech skills

Required Skills:
	•	Canva
	•	English Writing
	•	Printify (optional)
	•	Customer Support
	•	Ecommerce

Bonus if you have:
 • Experience using Printify, Redbubble, or similar
 • Graphic layout or product listing experience
 • Long-term commitment mindset

To Apply:
Send me:
 1. A short intro (include why this job interests you)
 2. Your resume or work history
 3. Screenshot of your internet speed
 4. (Optional) A Canva design you’ve made
 5. Your preferred monthly salary

Use subject line: POD VA – [Your First Name]
